story.text: The sites in a Roster can be broken down into categories which are made available to other plugins.
A blank line of markup starts a new line in the Roster.
Any line of markup that is not recognized as a site or special command can become a category name.
The category will include all sites on the current and subsequent Roster display lines until another category name is encountered.
Category names can appear before, after or even between sites on a line. Remember blank lines of markup start new lines in the Roster display.

Ward Cunningham

Uncategorized sites can be included but must appear before any category name.

ward.fed.wiki.org
ward.asia.wiki.org

Mike Caulfield
machines.hapgood.net
orientation.hapgood.net
All sites, including uncategorized sites, will be included in the automatically created 'all' category.
Shift-double-click a Roster to see what categories are made available to other plugins.
See [[About Activity Configuration]] for possible uses.

Any line of markup that is not recognized as a site or special command can become a category name.
The category will include all sites on the current and subsequent Roster display lines until another category name is encountered.

Category names can appear before, after or even between sites on a line. Remember blank lines of markup start new lines in the Roster display.
Uncategorized sites can be included but must appear before any category name.
All sites will be included in the 'all' category.
All sites, including uncategorized sites, will be included in the 'all' category.
All sites, including uncategorized sites, will be included in the 'all' category also made available to other plugins.
All sites, including uncategorized sites, will be included in the 'all' category automatically made available to other plugins.
All sites, including uncategorized sites, will be included in the additional 'all' category made available to other plugins.
All sites, including uncategorized sites, will be included in the 'all' category made available to other plugins.
All sites, including uncategorized sites, will be included in the automatically created 'all' category.
Shift-double-click a Roster to see what categories are made available to other plugins.
See [[About Activity Plugin]] for possible uses.
